Title: Better Pet Selector
Description:
An improved pet selection interface for starting a new game.

Adds icons and flavor text for each pet during the pet selection phase of a new game. Note that this mod [i]does not[/i] add any new pets to the game; pets will either need to be installed through mods or as a tier reward for supporting the [url=https://www.patreon.com/freeholdgames/]developers' Patreon[/url].

Source code: https://github.com/kernelmethod/QudMods/tree/main/BetterPetSelector
